original_text: At that time, Phinehas' wife was pregnant. She was ready to give birth. She heard the news that the Philistines had taken away God's Covenant Box. She heard that her husband Phinehas and his father Eli were dead. When she heard this news, she started to give birth to her baby. But she had a lot of pain.
korean_text: 그의 며느리인 비느하스의 아내가 임신하여 해산 때가 가까웠더니 하나님의 궤를 빼앗긴 것과 그의 시아버지와 남편이 죽은 소식을 듣고 갑자기 아파서 몸을 구푸려 해산하고

sentences.original_text: She was ready to give birth
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 아기를 낳을 준비가 되어 있었다

sentences.original_text: that the Philistines had taken away God's Covenant Box
She heard that her husband Phinehas
and his father Eli were dead
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 아버지 엘리가 죽었다는 것을 들었다

sentences.original_text: she started to give birth to her baby
But she had a lot of pain
